messages.title: Full recovery
messages.content: Securing folks' savings, jobs and homes came first; now comes the full recovery under Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will guarantee a job, education or training place for any young person unemployed for six months and grow the 'green job' sector exponentially.

issues.economy: The UK economy is changing fast and new people know that only Labour is prepared to invest properly to give everyone a first class start to, then proper support in, the exciting careers which await young adults today.

contactInformation.address: Mail c/o May McIntyre, 182 Carmuirs Avenue, Camelon, Falkirk, FK1 4LD

images.caption: Eric Joyce, Labour Candidate for Falkirk
